name.baseName: Trap pre-exploration ;Source rocks and terrigenous marine source rocks ; Natural gas exploration
圈闭预探 ; 烃源岩和陆源海相烃源岩 ; 天然气勘探

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Delta coal measures source rocks and terrigenous marine source rocks are developed in Enping Formation of Baiyun Sag, and their potential lithologic stratigraphic traps have self-generating, self-storing and self-capping reservoir-forming conditions, which have great exploration potential. Prediction is the main reservoir-forming combination of Baiyun Sag and the main direction of natural gas exploration in deep water area.
白云凹陷恩平组发育三角洲煤系烃源岩和陆源海相烃源岩，其潜在的岩性地层圈闭具有自生、自储、自盖的成藏条件，勘探潜力巨大，预测是白云凹陷主力成藏组合，是深水区天然气勘探的主体方向。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Baiyun Sag in Pearl River Mouth Basin

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Lithologic stratigraphic traps of Enping Formation have reservoir-forming conditions: authigenic conditions, self-storage conditions and self-sealing conditions.
恩平组岩性地层圈闭具有成藏条件：自生条件、自储条件、自封条件。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the utilization of the Enping Formation within the Baiyun Sag, located in the Pearl River Mouth Basin, for the purpose of natural gas exploration. The geological formation exhibits favorable sedimentary conditions, including delta coal measures source rocks and terrigenous marine source rocks that contribute to the development of lithologic stratigraphic traps. These traps have self-generating, self-storing, and self-capping conditions essential for reservoir formation. This area is predicted to be the primary reservoir-forming zone in Baiyun Sag and represents a significant direction for deep water natural gas exploration initiatives, with potential for discovering large and medium-sized lithologic and stratigraphic traps.
该数据集描述了位于珠江口盆地白云凹陷中恩平组在天然气勘探中的利用。地质构造具有有利的沉积条件，包括三角洲煤系烃源岩和陆源海相烃源岩，促进了岩性地层圈闭的发展。这些圈闭具有成藏的自生、自储和自封条件。当前区域预计将成为白云凹陷的主要成藏区，并代表了深水区天然气勘探的一个重要方向，具有发现大型和中型岩性和地层圈闭的潜力。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The sedimentary conditions of Enping Formation in Baiyun Sag form moderate sand-land ratio, which is beneficial to the development of lithologic stratigraphic traps. At present, more than 20 potential large and medium-sized lithologic stratigraphic traps have been searched, including six types, such as stratigraphic overlap, nearshore subaqueous fan, beach bar, low-level fan, delta front foregroove wedge sandstone body and updip pinchout sandstone body.
白云凹陷恩平组沉积条件形成了适中的砂地比 ，有利于岩性地层圈闭的发育 ，目前共搜索到潜在大中型岩性地层圈 闭20多个，包括地层超 覆、近岸水下扇、滩坝、低位扇、三角洲前缘前积楔形砂岩体和上 倾尖灭砂岩体等6种类型 。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Delta coal measures source rocks and terrigenous marine source rocks are developed in Enping Formation of Baiyun Sag, and their potential lithologic and stratigraphic traps have reservoir-forming conditions of self-generation, self-storage and self-capping, which have great exploration potential. Prediction is the main reservoir-forming combination of Baiyun Sag and the main direction of natural gas exploration in deep water area
白云凹陷恩平组发育三角洲煤系烃源岩和陆源海相烃源岩，其潜在的岩性地层圈闭具有自生、自 储、自盖的成藏条件，勘探潜力巨大，预测是白云凹陷主力成藏组合，是深水区天然气勘探的主体方向

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 张功成;陈莹;杨海长;韩银学;赵钊;杨东升;王龙颖;黄萱; 恩平组岩性地层圈闭——白云凹陷深水区天然气勘探新领域. 中国海上油气 1–9 (2015).
张功成;陈莹;杨海长;韩银学;赵钊;杨东升;王龙颖;黄萱; 恩平组岩性地层圈闭——白云凹陷深水区天然气勘探新领域. 中国海上油气 1–9 (2015).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should consider the geological uniqueness of the area, relying on the sedimentary characteristics informed by the Enping Formation for accurate prediction and exploration activities. Special attention should be given to the identification of authigenic conditions, self-storage, and self-sealing qualities of the potential traps. It is crucial to apply this data primarily for the assessment of exploration potential and to guide the strategic planning for natural gas extraction in the specified deep water area. Methodological approach in utilizing this data should be consistent with current geological exploratory practices and industry standards.
使用这份数据集的用户应考虑到该区域的地质独特性，依赖恩平组的沉积特征进行准确的预测和勘探活动。应特别注意对潜在圈闭的自生条件、自储和自封特性的识别。关键是要将此数据主要应用于勘探潜力评估，并指导指定深水区域天然气提取的战略规划。利用这些数据的方法应与当前的地质勘查实践和行业标准保持一致。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Reservoir porosity, the data is distribution, the data filled in the quantity is the result of average (median value)
储层孔隙度,数据为分布，量中填写的数据为取平均（取中值）的结果
Pore ​​space, the data is distribution, the data filled in the quantity is the result of average (median value)
孔隙空间,数据为分布，量中填写的数据为取平均（取中值）的结果
